title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file.
2) Make modifications to the file (e.g., move an existing class).
3) Click the SaveAs icon located next to the Save Icon.
4) A dialog will appear.
5) Browse for a valid container location.
6) Type the filename without including the extension, as it is not requested.
7) Click Ok.

Observed Behavior: The file is added to the specified location in the Navigator, but no file extension is shown.

Expected Behavior: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original unless explicitly changed.
